rooms.description: A spacious entrance area that sets the tone for the Scandinavian farmhouse. Features a minimalist design with natural wood finishes and integrated storage.
An open living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that maximizes daylight, designed in Scandinavian aesthetics, emphasizing simplicity and functionality.
A versatile dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Features streamlined furniture and subtle natural lighting for a cozy atmosphere.
Modern Scandinavian style kitchen with efficient layout, built-in storage, and integrated appliances ensuring functionality.
Dedicated library space featuring floor-to-ceiling shelves and ample seating. Designed for quiet reading in a well-lit environment.

openings.description: Large, elegant door with a Scandinavian design, serving as the primary entrance with emphasis on security and minimalistic aesthetics.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated in living room and library to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu principles of proper alignment.
Balcony access near the living area that aligns with local building norms, offering outdoor space for relaxation.

rooms.description: A large master bedroom designed in Scandinavian style featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Includes built-in wardrobes and a reading nook.
A secondary bedroom with a minimalist design, optimized for space and comfort.

openings.description: Balconies integrated into the master bedroom providing natural light and fresh air in accordance with Vastu principles.
Multiple window openings ensuring adequate ventilation and daylight throughout bedrooms.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for guests or future use, following Scandinavian design principles with efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Central light well to maximize natural light and ventilation in the top floor, aligning with local norms.
Service door for maintenance access on the second floor that adheres to building norms.
